caveats: Dataset collated by OCHA from various reports.
name: ukraine-hostilities
notes:
#DO NOT MAKE PUBLIC
This dataset contains the places with hostilities in the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

organization.name: hdx
organization.title: HDX
organization.description: The Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) is an open data sharing platform managed by the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs. The HDX organization is managed by the HDX data team and is used to share data on behalf of a number of partners

title: Ukraine: Hostilities
